merpi_desc: %USER's lap. Soft and inviting, you could take a seat on it or maybe reach out and...

merpi_normal: %USER is trying to push %TARGET's %T_PART down into their lap like they want it to never be seen again!!
merpi_flowery: %USER is trying to push %TARGET's %T_PART down into their lap like they want it to never be seen again!!

merpi_normal: %USER eases %TARGET's %T_PART down agianst their lap reassuringly.
merpi_flowery: %USER eases %TARGET's %T_PART down agianst their lap reassuringly.

merpi_normal: %USER shoves %TARGET's %T_PART down against their lap needily.
merpi_flowery: %USER shoves %TARGET's %T_PART down against their lap needily.

merpi_normal: %USER gets their lap all up into %TARGET's %T_PART
merpi_flowery: %USER gets their lap all up into %TARGET's %T_PART
merpi_repeat: %USER gets their lap all up on %TARGET's %T_PART.

merpi_normal: %USER presses %TARGET's %T_PART against their lap hard, not letting it get away easily!
merpi_flowery: %USER presses %TARGET's %T_PART against their lap hard, not letting it get away easily!
